name: Create ANC Proposal
description: Creates a proposal or budget document in the ANC Proposal Engine. ONLY use when the user explicitly asks to CREATE, GENERATE, or MAKE a proposal/budget/LOI. Requires a client name and at least one priced line item. Do NOT invoke when the user merely mentions a client name or discusses pricing without requesting document creation.
author: @basheer

input.hint: Base URL of your ANC Proposal Engine (no trailing slash)
The AGENT_SKILL_API_KEY value from your ANC app's .env file

examples.prompt: Create a budget proposal for Dallas Cowboys with LED Display $84,000 and Installation $36,000
Generate a proposal for MetLife Stadium: LED $350,000, Structural $120,000, Electrical $45,000, Install $80,000, CMS $25,000
examples.call: {"client_name": "MetLife Stadium", "line_items": "[{\"description\": \"LED Display System\", \"price\": 350000}, {\"description\": \"Structural / Mounting\", \"price\": 120000}, {\"description\": \"Electrical\", \"price\": 45000}, {\"description\": \"Installation Labor\", \"price\": 80000}, {\"description\": \"CMS / Control System\", \"price\": 25000}]", "document_type": "proposal"}

examples.prompt: Make a budget for WVU Coliseum with the pricing we just discussed

client_name.description: The client or venue name for the proposal (e.g., 'Dallas Cowboys', 'MetLife Stadium')

line_items.description: JSON string array of line items. Each item has 'description' (string) and 'price' (number). Example: [{"description": "LED Display", "price": 84000}]

document_type.description: Type of document: 'budget' (default), 'proposal', or 'loi' (letter of intent)

project_name.description: Optional custom project name. Defaults to 'Budget for {client_name}'

notes.description: Optional additional notes to include in the proposal
